resources.string: Allows to send text from KP2A via InputStick to your PC.
Locked after 3 minutes of inactivity. Open again from Keepass2Android application.
InputStick plugin: Google Authenticator is NOT installed!
InputStick plugin: Copy code to clipboard (30 seconds remaining)

IMPORTANT:
InputStick Plugin for KP2A is now published on Google Play on "InputStick" developer account. This will allow for more frequent and faster updates. Current release of the plugin (published by "Croco Apps") will no longer be updated and will soon be removed from Google Play store. At this moment both releases offer the same functionality, but it is highly recommended to migrate to the new release as soon as possible.

More info:
http://blog.inputstick.com/2016/01/kp2a-plugin-migration.html

How to migrate:
1. Click "Download" button below and install new release from Google Play store. 
Alternatively for can download .apk file from http://inputstick.com/download
Source code is available here: https://github.com/inputstick
2. Run new app. It will ask you to remove old version of the plugin (to avoid duplicated actions in Keepass2Android).
3. Remember to configure new app ("Configure as plugin", set keyboard layout, etc.).
4. Check out new features (Macros, Clipboard/Authenticator).
